mapper.sql: t.id as id, t.parent_id as parentId, t.enum_id as enumId, t.enum_name as enumName, t.enum_name2 as enumName2, t.enum_value as enumValue, t.filter_condition as filterCondition, t.display_order as displayOrder, t.valid_status as validStatus, t.created as created, t.updated as updated, t.old_value as oldValue
